Package org.lwjgl.opengl

Class CGL.Functions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.opengl.CGL.Functions
  • Enclosing class:
    CGL
    public static final class CGL.Functions
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the function pointers loaded from GL.getFunctionProvider().
